name: POPAPP
short_description: POPAPP is an app that transforms sketches into click-through prototypes.
long_description:
POPAPP transforms sketches into click-through prototypes in minutes. Design
wireframes on paper. Pen & paper are the best tools. Import your sketches by
taking a picture. Create a storyboard by linking your sketches together with
"link spots". Press play and simulate your user interface to make sure
everything flows correctly. Share your prototype with colleagues and friends.
They can try out your prototype in any device. Youâ€™d be surprised how valuable
their feedback can be. POPAPP is widely adopted, its users include Yahoo, Zynga,
LinkedIn and 37Signals.
